content: Why is this called Mr. Pumpkin 2? Is there a #1? Or anothersimilar game with Mr. Pumpkin? I really enjoyed this game. I have been looking for Mr Pumpkin 1, but can't find anything even close. Is there a #1? I would love to play it.
replyContent: Hi there, the first episode of Mr Pumpkin series is "Mr. Pumpkin's Adventure", you can search this name to find it, hope you can enjoy it~

content: Nice game!
i played it, it was so cool :D
Really cute game, entertaining, and fun little puzzles.
replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We're happy to hear that you're enjoying the game.

content: I liked it a lot.
Good

Absolutely loved it. I didn't find it too short. Was disappointed when it ended... only because l wanted more. Did pay for dragon coins (whatever they were called) other times... l turned to the walkthru. Choices üëç I hope there's more to come??
I really really recommend this game ü•∞‚ò∫Ô∏è

content: Great game but way too short, especially when you're paying.
replyContent: Greetings Mrs B, thank you for contacting. We will release even more interesting content in the future game and make the game longer. Wish you the best luck and have a nice day.

content: I LOVE THIS GAME! Please make more.
replyContent: Many thanks for leaving review, this makes us super proud!

content: Enjoyed it, wish there were more games like this. Could be longer but definitely worth paying for.
replyContent: Hi Chris, we are glad to hear that you like our game, and we will try to make each player enjoy the game. We will let the devs know your thoughts that the game could be longer. Thanks for your support.

content: Fun little game. Hope another one will come after this one. Not all spots have a icon popup which I didn't know about.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your appreciation, we will try to collect more ideas and try bring to more fun adventures back in the future~

content: Just finished second round with dragon gate open, awesome! Just wish it was longer, such a great game!
replyContent: Thank you for taking time to leave a review. We are happy to hear that you're enjoying the game. We wish you all the best on your journey in the game. Kindest regards.

content: The game play and puzzles, are fun and entertaining. However, I am disappointed that I bought the game, considering how short it was... I also needed only one or maybe two hints, throughout the game, and paid more for hints I never needed. All in all the game was decent, besides the lack of indicators on certain playable items. In my opinion, it was certainly not worth spending money on, considering there are free games out there that are just as good if not better.

Loved the game but after I completed the first part of it and got past the dragon level. It kept shutting off. I made it through the next level solving the puzzles and after inserting the blue and red pill pieces into the wall it leaves a picture. But when I examine the picture the game screen goes black and takes me back to the main menu:( I liked the game. Wish it didn't have that bug.
replyContent: Hi Nicole, if you encounter the crashing issue, please try to switch to other networks, reinstall the game or clear cache, if it still persists, please feel free to contact us via FB(@https://business.facebook.com/MrPumpkin2WoK/) and provide us with your account information (Such as User Id, Server), we will try our best to help you.

content: PRETTY COOL GAME. I ENJOYED IT!

Man am I tired of pay to play. And I paid for this GAME. FML every game is so dishonest now. Pay for the game. Play for two minutes. Get asked to pay up sucker. I was really close to giving this game a massive boost and promoting it. But thought I would play a bit more.
replyContent: Hi J M, we appreciate your feedback, please rest assured that your feedback is heard and that it will be forwarded to the team for evaluation. Should you have additional feedback or thoughts to share, feel free to contact our customer support. Kind regards.

content: Fun
Wow! What a great game! üòÄ
replyContent: Hi Karen. Thanks a lot for your nice words. Have fun.

content: Fun overall but some puzzles (clock on chapter 4 and the letters in bonus chapter) are impossible to solve
replyContent: Hi Leon, please tell us more details about the issue with clock on chapter 4 and the letters in bonus chapter you are facing, you can contact us via in-game support or via Facebook(@MrPumpkin2WoK), and we will try to help you as soon as possible. Have a nice day!

content: Very cool game. Quality art and cultural beauty. Enjoyed the spiritual political and social themes embedded in the art of the game. Well worth the couple of bucks for the experience. Keep creating art and meaningful games!!

It's unusual to find peace and scerenity on the Play Store, but this game represents about 98% of it available to purchase. It might be only a medium length game, but the gaming experience is so soft and beautiful that it really is a pleasurable time that you spend in the Walled City. The characters have a very genuine character and placid charisma and the animations are so pleasing when you notice them. Honestly nothing will bring you this kind of happiness on the play store.

Uninstalled it after a while. Almost impossible to put the items in place. It took ages just to put the cheese in place and after so many attempts to place a key on a lock i uninstalled it. There goes my money. No way is equal to the isoland series.
replyContent: Greetings, could you please try to contact us via https://business.facebook.com/MrPumpkin2WoK/ with your problem, we will try to help you out.

content: This is so much more difficult than I expected. I'll definitely be using walkthroughs at more parts than I'd like to admit but it's fun üòÅüëç
Really fun after you figure out how everything works
One of the best games I've played on my phone in the last 10 years!!!
Nicely done, enjoyable game. Well worth paying for!
Puzzler with great graphics ans atmosphere. The puzzles are on the easy side but definitely worth the price. Now bring Mr Pumpkin 1 to Android!
LOVE these games!
Great game. It's a bit short, but I enjoyed it thoroughly! Love the art style. Well done.
love the old graphics of hong kong

Worst part of this game is when I finished it and went to buy mr. Pumkin 1 only to discover there was none!.....but awesome ....looking forward to #3....also no in app purchases needed to play this game...huge plus
Fun addicting game
Love this!! Not too easy. Not too hard. Relaxing.
Great game!!

Played Isoland and didn't know that this game was the same producer. Enjoyed this game as much as Isoland. Previous rating mentioned difficulty of puzzles. I agree - make it a little more challenging.
Good game, puzzles were kinda easy, but the graphics were brilliant !
A thoroughly enjoyable game although I'm often not sure what I'm supposed to do but, it doesn't matter because the artwork and music is so unique and enjoyable.
Best game out of all of the games I have ever played, but why is is so very short? I beat it and finished it in 5 hours. :(
I love this game. Bummed when I finished. Makes you think but puzzle aren't too hard. Please Cotton, keep making games.
Loved this game. I purchased it and am having a blast.
Graphics where great,short game but 1.99 it was fun to play.I enjoy these types of games so it help me past some time away without being bored.
Installed on another device, works great. Love the graphics and the storyline!
replyContent: Greetings, we suggest you delete the game, clear the cache and reinstall it to see if it works. If the problem persists, please feel free to contact us via our official Facebook https://business.facebook.com/MrPumpkin2WoK/. Thank you.

content: Love the graphics, the little details that make the game so tactile, everything on the surface is good. My issue is the puzzles are way too simple, it's too easy to complete. Worth the money for the time spent playing, but there was no challenge here - everything was handed to you on a plate.
replyContent: Thanks for you appreciation and review, we will record your concern about difficulty and story length to our team for a further consideration and keep optimizing. Have a nice day:)

content: Hope You Make another game like this..i Will buy
It's like picking up a story book back when you're still a kid. But it explores a dark reality of the world. It's really not as dark as i expected and I would let an 8 year old and above play it.
Great game. easy puzzle. the achievement should be hidden or given a little clue, so its more interesting to achieve.
I restarted my phone and the game plays great. good graphics good puzzles great game.
replyContent: Thanks for your appreciation, we will keep optimizing and try bring more instersting stories  to players in the future.

content: Short very short

content: Cool but a very short experience for a game that is paid for..

Amazing lovely game

content: This game is good, puzzles are challenging but the game is too short.. I manage to clear the game plus bonus level in less than 4 hours.
replyContent: Greetings, thanks for you appreciation, we will deliver your concern about the story length to our team for a further consideration and keep optimizing. Have a nice day:)

content: Excellent little puzzle game and such a warm tribute to the Kowloon Walled City!
An absolute delight. Very reminiscent of Machinarium with a very relaxed pace, great art style and a wonderful atmosphere. Easily worth the asking price.
replyContent: Greetings, we are glad to hear that you like our game and thanks for your review. Have a nice journey in game.

content: Beautiful artwork and music. Relaxing game. I enjoyed it very much. Thank you developers for yet another awesome game!
replyContent: Greetings, many thanks for the awesome review, this makes us super proud!

content: This is a cool little game with no option to change the language unless you understand the language that it's in . I'm uninstalling I cannot understand it! Sorry! Not worth $2.69 The game is is Russian or something even the hints and it's even very hard to start the game!!!! help!
replyContent: Greetings, thanks for your comment, when you are on the main page(the bus stop), you should see a large sign on the left side of the screen with "Language" writen at the top. You can tap that sign to change languages. Please let us know if that helps resolve your issue.

content: Tried it on two different phones just got a black screen
replyContent:
Greetings, may you please try the following steps, 
1.Restart phone
2.Switch to other networks
3.Minimize the number of running background applications
4.Clear the cache
if it still persists, please don't hesitate to contact us via FB(@MrPumpkin2WoK), we will try to help you.
